meanings.definition: A type of bird with a thick, conical beak.
meanings.sent1: The grosbeaks chirped happily in the tree.
meanings.sent2: I saw a flock of grosbeaks at the bird feeder.
meanings.sent3: The grosbeaks had a beak competition to see who could crack the most seeds.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as a grosbeak's beak when she tackled the difficult task.
meanings.sent5: The colorful grosbeaks stood out among the other birds with their unique beaks.

meanings.sent1: We spotted a pair of grosbeaks in the forest.
meanings.sent2: The grosbeaks flew gracefully across the sky.
meanings.sent3: The grosbeaks organized a singing competition to entertain the other birds.
meanings.sent4: Their unity was as powerful as a flock of grosbeaks soaring together.
meanings.sent5: The melodious songs of the grosbeaks filled the air with joy.
